definition: seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: There should be a very little mic cable slack at the mic stand base.
sentences.chinese: 这将只有麦架基座上的一小部分线的是松弛的。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is necessary to study appendant effect of moving bases movement on the electro-optical equipments.
sentences.chinese: 所以有必要研究动基座的运动对光电设备的附加影响。

sentences.english: Use silicone rubber around the base of each leg and around the wood screw's head.
sentences.chinese: 用硅酮橡胶仔细封好基座腿的下端以及木螺丝头。

sentences.english: The standard base is fabricated from a structural Aluminum channel alloy 6061-T6.
sentences.chinese: 标准基座采用结构铝合金6061制造而成。

sentences.english: The foundation bed of the pyramid has a large circumference of several miles.
sentences.chinese: 塔的基座方圆有好几里，规模很大。

sentences.english: Rod end housing with weldable base.
sentences.chinese: 杆端座体带有可焊接的基座。

sentences.english: Lead-weighted base with pressed steel cover and steel stem.
sentences.chinese: 稳固的钢制基座和灯杆。

sentences.english: The columns he saw, were, in his view, the pedestals of the idols of the Persians.
sentences.chinese: 栏他看到了，在他看来，基座的偶像的波斯人。

sentences.english: At the base of the Sulpice obelisk.
sentences.chinese: 在圣叙尔皮斯方尖碑的基座处。

sentences.english: The concrete supports, in subtly varying arced forms, are deliberately delicate and lace-like in appearance.
sentences.chinese: 混凝土基座微妙的弧度变化十分精致，就像蕾丝裙边。

sentences.english: Then, use wood screws to secure legs to the roof.
sentences.chinese: 然后，用木螺丝把基座腿固定在屋顶上。

sentences.english: The steel pin base also acts as a termite shield.
sentences.chinese: 这些钢钉基座同时也是一块防蚁板。

sentences.english: At the guides there is a possibility to apply a machine balance and to align the plant over the pedestals .
sentences.chinese: 在导轨上，可以使用机械平衡和调整在基座上的位置。

sentences.english: They set the pole in a bed of concrete.
sentences.chinese: 他们把旗竿竖在水泥基座上。

sentences.english: The first step is to excavate for the pedestal and ramp .
sentences.chinese: 第一步就是要挖掘的基座及匝道。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a water pipe anti-climb base comprising a base body.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种水管防攀爬基座。

definition: Buddhist ornamentation decorating the upper story of a pagoda
white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
to tower/standing tall and upright (of large building)
